ack.p: The authors wish to acknowledge the contribution of Suzana Sabaiduc and Catharine Chambers to the summary of recent virus surveillance findings. The authors also acknowledge the critical review of the present document by the Public Health Agency of Canada and the Infectious Diseases and Immunization Committee of the Canadian Paediatric Society and its review and endorsement by the AMMI Canada Guidelines Committee. AMMI Canada would like to acknowledge the Public Health Agency of Canada who contributed by funding the translation of the guidelines. The authors also extend appreciation to Ms Angela Nelson for her excellent secretarial assistance.
